div.p: … of the vintage …, all his activities (have been performed?) …, of the productive possession and the … However, after a few days, Pasion … bought for Onnophris himself …, according to the old calendar; they were shut into …, your brother said to the donkey driver …, onto the prairy of the …? four hundred bundles of hay. Translation: N. Reggiani, P.Cair.Mich. 2 12 C
